channel.title: Testflightapp on PR
channel.description: Recent content in Testflightapp on PR

item.title: Wallpaper - Testflight app
item.description: I really liked the background image pattern used in testflightapp.com. It is so cool that I have replaced my all time favorite iPad-Safari-fabric texture to gray varient given below.

item.title: Distribute your iPhone/iPad adhoc builds Over The Air using Dropbox
item.description: Update: I recently found this site called diawi.com which allows you to distribute the app similar to file-sharing sites, drag and drop ipa file and share the link to the testers.
